root.name: Cut the Rope: Holiday Gift
root.description: Overview Cut The Rope: Holiday Gift consists of one stage (box) of 25 themed levels. Like the original the game was developed by ZeptoLab and published by Chillingo. The gameplay is largely the same as the original Cut The Rope but with the addition of christmas stockings. The stockings exist as coloured pairs, with the candy able to enter one stocking and instantly exit the other with momentum conserved.
